subject: Cooperation proposal
description_text:
Hi,

My name is Patrick, and I’ve been running YOJI720, the largest simracing
YouTube channel in Poland, for over 12 years.

I’ve been following your brand for quite some time and really appreciate
the way you make high-quality, affordable simracing pedals accessible to
the community. However, I’ve noticed that there are currently no Polish
YouTube reviews of your products and I’d love to change that.

I’d like to create a dedicated video review of your Black Simsonn Plus X
pedals with pedal plate and present them to my audience. My goal would be
to showcase the product’s quality, performance, and value. Potentially
opening the door to new customers from the growing Polish simracing market.

Would it be possible to receive a review unit of the pedals for this
collaboration?

Best regards,
Yoji720
-- 
*Yoji720** - YouTuber, streamer *
YouTube <https://www.youtube.com/yoji720> | Instagram
<http://instagram.com/yoji720> | TikTok <https://www.tiktok.com/@yoji_720> |
 Twitch <https://www.twitch.tv/yoji720>
